text: Haddaba markay maqashay hadalkooda xanta ah bay u cid dirtay oo u diyaarisay marti qaad wanaagsan; oo siisay mid walba oo ka mid ah middi, oo (ku) tidhi (Yuusuf): U soo bax. Markaasay markay arkeen aad u weyneysteen, oo iska gooyeen gacmahoodii (iyagoo la cajabsan). oo yidhaahdeen; Allaah baa ka hufan (nuqsaan)8 Kani maba aha qof caadi ah! Kani ma aha waxaan aheyn malag sharaf leh
